titleStmt.title: Anthropophagus: or, a caution for the credulous. A morall discourse vpon the 25. verse of the 26. chapter of the Prouerbs of Solomon. Written by E.S.B. of D. and sometimes fellow of S.l.C. in C.
titleStmt.author: Sutton, Edward, b. 1597 or 8.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A caution for the credulous.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
